special_notes: Alabama does NOT allow the use of the letter 'O'. The number '0' must always be used. Vertical characters must be entered as seen. Do not key 3 character verticals. On current standard plates, the registration begins with a 1 or 2 number county code. OMIT '200' on LEFT side, OMIT 'T' on LEFT side, INCLUDE 'X2' stacked in MIDDLE, INCLUDE 'TL'/'TR' stacked, INCLUDE 'DV'/'Q1' stacked.

stacked_character_rules.position: OMIT '200' on LEFT side, OMIT 'T' on LEFT side, INCLUDE 'X2' stacked in MIDDLE, INCLUDE 'TL'/'TR' stacked, INCLUDE 'DV'/'Q1' stacked
stacked_character_rules.notes: Include stacked in middle, omit on left side
